member.name: M:UAD.API.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:UAD.API.Controllers.CustomFieldController
member.summary: API methods exposing custom fields for subscription management

member.name: M:UAD.API.Controllers.CustomFieldController.GetCustomFields(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the product demographics and product adhocs identified by productCode or all demographics and product adhocs if product wasn't provided.
member.returns: A list of product demographics and product adhocs for productCode or a list of demographics and product level adhocs if product wasn't provided.
member.example:
GET http://api.kmpsgroup.com/api/customfield/methods/GetCustomFields HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json APIAccessKey: <YOUR-API-ACCESS-KEY-HERE> X-Customer-ID: 99999 Host: api.kmpsgroup.com Content-Length: 422
"product"
OR pass no parameters to get all

HTTP/1.1 200 OK Cache-Control: no-cache Pragma: no-cache Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Expires: -1 Server: Microsoft-IIS/7.5 X-AspNet-Version: 4.0.30319 X-Powered-By: ASP.NET Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2015 19:27:41 GMT Content-Length: 259
[ { "ProductId": 0, "ProductCode": "PubCode", "Name": "Test", "DisplayName": "Test", "DisplayOrder": 0, "IsMultipleValue": true, "IsRequired": false, "IsActive": true, "IsAdHoc": false }, { "ProductId": 0, "ProductCode": "PubCode", "Name": "Test", "DisplayName": "Test", "DisplayOrder": 0, "IsMultipleValue": true, "IsRequired": false, "IsActive": true, "IsAdHoc": false } ]

member.name: M:UAD.API.Controllers.CustomFieldController.GetConsensusCustomFields
member.summary: Retrieves the Consensus adhocs and master groups
member.returns: A list of Consensus adhocs and master groups
member.example: GET http://api.kmpsgroup.com/api/customfield/methods/GetConsensusCustomFields HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json APIAccessKey: <YOUR-API-ACCESS-KEY-HERE> X-Customer-ID: 99999 Host: api.kmpsgroup.com Content-Length: 422

HTTP/1.1 200 OK Cache-Control: no-cache Pragma: no-cache Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Expires: -1 Server: Microsoft-IIS/7.5 X-AspNet-Version: 4.0.30319 X-Powered-By: ASP.NET Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2015 19:27:41 GMT Content-Length: 259
[ { "ProductId": 0, "ProductCode": "PubCode", "Name": "Test", "DisplayName": "Test", "DisplayOrder": 1, "IsMultipleValue": false, "IsRequired": false, "IsActive": true, "IsAdHoc": false }, { "ProductId": 0, "ProductCode": "PubCode", "Name": "Test", "DisplayName": "Test", "DisplayOrder": 2, "IsMultipleValue": false, "IsRequired": false, "IsActive": true, "IsAdHoc": false } ]

members.member:
Retrieves the valid demographic values identified by a combination of productCode and/or customFieldName. If no values passed it will return all valid demographic values.
emailAddress productCode A list of valid demographic values identified by a combination of productCode and/or customFieldName. If no parameters are passed it will return all demographic values.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to create a Framework object from the parsed header value
member.param: The strongly typed value from the HTTP header
An object into which the created framework object will be stored.
member.returns: True if a framework object was successfully created, otherwise false.

member.name: M:UAD.API.Infrastructure.Authentication.RequestHeaderParserBase`2.ValidateRequestHeader(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Provides a uniform method for extracting an HTTP header value as a string, parsing that into a strongly typed value and using the strongly typed value to create a Framework object and storing this for use by API Controllers. If this cannot be done (for example, because the header is not valid or not provided), uniform error handling is provided to ensure API users understand the specific error conditions causing authentication failure (e.g. returning a message describing the specific problem in addition to a 401 Unauthorized Error to the client.)
member.param: the action context associated with the current request.

member.name: M:UAD.API.Infrastructure.Authentication.RequestHeaderParserBase`2.StoreProperties(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext,`0,`1)
member.summary: Responsible for stashing away the parsed header value and framework object for later use

member.name: M:UAD.API.Infrastructure.Authentication.RequestHeaderParserBase`2.TryValidateRequestHeader(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext,System.String@,System.String@,`0@,`1@)
member.summary: Responsible for validating and parsing the header and creating the framework object or, in failure cases, generating the failure message.
member.param: action context for the current request
if unsuccessful, this will describe the reason for failure, otherwise null
set to the string value of the HTTP header, if present, otherwise null.
set to the strongly typed value of the HTTP header if the header can be parsed, otherwise set to the default value of HeaderValueT
set to the framework object created/retrieved if successful, otherwise null.
member.returns: true if the header is present, and be parsed, and yields a framework object; otherwise and failureMessage is set to a non-null value.
